p: SFTSV strains used in this study were a recombinant derivative of the Hubei-29 strain generated by reverse genetics (rHB29). This sequence is based on a plaque-purified stock called Hubei 29pp (HB29pp) provided by Amy Lambert (CDC Arbovirus Diseases Branch, Division of Vector-Borne Infectious Diseases, Fort Collins, CO) ( 55). CB1/2014 and CB8/2016 were isolated from the sera of SFTSV-infected patients hospitalized with SFTS symptoms at Chungbuk National University Hospital, South Korea ( 45). Stock viruses were generated by propagation of the virus up to a maximum of 5 times from the original patient sera.
